q: What is the core technology behind Qlik Sense called?
In Qlik Sense, values that are 'Selected' are shown in which color?
In Qlik Sense, values that are 'Excluded' (not associated with current selections) are shown in Gray.
The _____ is the central place where you can find and open your Qlik Sense apps.
Rearrange Selection Colors:
What is a 'Dimension' in Qlik Sense predominantly used for?
A 'Measure' is a calculation based on fields, such as Sum or Count.
The _____ mode allows you to create and modify visualizations in a sheet.
Match Term:
Which tool in Qlik Sense allows non-technical users to load and associate data visually?
You can drag and drop an Excel file directly into Qlik Sense to load data.
The _____ bubble usually indicates a recommended association between two data tables.
Rearrange Load Process:
Which chart type is best for comparing total values across categories (e.g., Sales by Region)?
A Pie chart is ideal for showing trends over time.
The _____ chart shows the relationship between two measures.
Match Chart:
What happens when you click on a slice in a Pie chart?
o: It selects that value and filters the rest of the app

q: Selections in Qlik Sense are global and apply to all sheets in the app.
The _____ bar at the top of the screen shows your current selections.
Rearrange Selection:
What is the function of the 'Smart Search' tool?
o: To search for text across the entire data set/all fields
To search for a chart type

q: You can lock a selection to prevent it from being accidentally cleared.
The _____ button clears all current selections.
Match Selection State:
Which visualization allows you to display a single aggregated value, like 'Total Sales'?
A Table visualization allows you to see detailed row-level data.
The _____ table can pivot data, grouping by dimensions on rows and columns.
Rearrange KPI:
What feature allows you to tell a story with snapshots of your data?
Snapshots in a story are static images and never update.
To take a snapshot of a visualization, you click the _____ icon on the chart.
Match Story Element:
What is the purpose of 'Master Items'?
o: To create reusable dimensions, measures, and visualizations

q: If you update a Master Item, it updates everywhere it is used in the app.
The _____ panel on the left contains charts, fields, and master items.
Rearrange Master Item:
Which expression calculates the total value of the 'Sales' field?
Count(CustomerID) returns the number of unique Customer IDs if they are all distinct logic is Count(Distinct ...) or just number of rows.
The _____ function returns the average value of a field.
Match Expression:
How can you view the data model structure (tables and links)?
In the Data Model Viewer, a key icon indicates a field that links two tables.
The _____ key consists of two or more fields combined to create a unique link.
Rearrange View Model:
What is a 'Sheet' in Qlik Sense?
o: A page that acts as a canvas for visualizations

q: You can have multiple sheets in a single Qlik Sense app.
Which chart type allows you to combine a bar chart and a line chart in the same visualization?
A Gauge chart is used to display a single measure value against a target or range.
The _____ visualization displays hierarchical data using nested rectangles.
Rearrange Combo:
What is the purpose of a 'Bookmark' in Qlik Sense?
o: To save a specific set of selections and filters for quick access
To save a web page URL

q: Bookmarks can be shared with other users if the app is published.
The _____ tool allows you to draw a freehand loop around points in a scatter plot to select them.
Match Selection Tool:
Which property allows you to add a description directly under the chart title?
You can turn off the hover tooltip for a chart in its properties.
The _____ property allows you to credit a data source at the bottom of a chart.
Rearrange Properties:
How can you export a visualization as an image?
You can download the underlying data of a chart into an Excel file.
The _____ export format creates a printable document of the entire sheet or story.
Match Export:
In the Data Manager, what does the 'Recommended Associations' feature do?
o: Suggests links between tables based on field name similarities and data profiling

q: You must write code to load data in the Data Manager.
The _____ card shows summary statistics (uniques, nulls) for a field in the Data Manager.
Rearrange Association:
Which basic script keyword is used to bring data into Qlik Sense?
The SELECT statement is often used when loading data from SQL databases.
The _____ editor is where advanced users write the ETL script.
Match Script:
What allows you to change the color of bars in a bar chart based on a measure?
o: Appearance > Colors and legend > By measure

q: Qlik Sense supports creating custom color palettes.
The _____ coloring option assigns a single solid color to all items in the chart.
Rearrange Color:
Which chart is best to show the distribution of data points along two axes?
A Distribution plot is good for comparing range and distribution for groups of numerical data.
The _____ plot uses dots to represent values for two different numeric variables.
Match Plot:
How do you navigate between sheets in an app?
o: Use the Sheet Navigator (top right) or Next/Prev arrows

q: The 'App Overview' button shows all sheets in a grid view.
The _____ sheet is the first sheet a user sees when opening the app (usually).
Rearrange Navigation:
What happens to the data in Qlik Sense when you verify and load new data?
o: The app is reloaded with fresh data from the sources

q: Qlik Sense typically loads data into its in-memory engine.
In Qlik Sense data modeling, a table containing quantitative data (numbers) is typically called a _____ table.
What is a 'Dimension Table' in a Star Schema?
o: A table containing descriptive attributes (e.g., Customer Name, Product Category)
A table that links two fact tables

q: A Star Schema consists of a central fact table connected to multiple dimension tables.
Rearrange Schema:
What is a 'Synthetic Key' in Qlik Sense?
o: A generated key created when two tables share two or more fields with the same name
A primary key defined by the user

q: Synthetic keys are generally considered good practice and improve performance.
Match Key:
A _____ reference occurs when there is a closed loop of associations between tables.
Which object allows you to group multiple visualizations into tabs?
Pivot tables in Qlik Sense allow you to expand and collapse row groups.
The _____ dimension in a pivot table is displayed horizontally across the top.
Rearrange Pivot:
What is 'Set Analysis' used for?
o: To define a scope of calculation different from the current selection state
To analyze the data set structure

q: In Set Analysis, the identifier '$' represents the current selection state.
The identifier '1' in Set Analysis represents the _____ set of records (ignoring selections).
Match Set Identifier:
Which syntax correctly calculates Sum(Sales) for the year 2023, ignoring other selections?
Rearrange Set Syntax:
What is a 'Drill-down' dimension?
o: A hierarchical group of fields where selecting one level reveals the next
A dimension that drills into the hard drive
A single field with many values

q: A 'Cyclic' group allows users to switch between different dimensions in the same chart.
You create a drill-down group in the _____ Items section.
Match Dimension Type:
Which function converts the first letter of each word in a string to uppercase?
The Text() function forces a value to be treated as text.
The _____ function groups records and concatenates values into a string with a delimiter.
Rearrange String Func:
What is a 'Variable' in Qlik Sense used for?
o: Storing a static value or expression for reuse

q: Variables can be used in set analysis expressions (e.g., $(vYear)).
You can manage variables in the _____ button in the edit mode.
Match Var Syntax:
Which chart is suitable for showing progress towards a goal?
A Waterfall chart is used to show how an initial value is affected by positive and negative values.
The _____ chart displays the distribution of a numeric variable using bars of different heights.
Rearrange Waterfall:
What is the 'Auto-Calendar' feature?
o: A script block automatically generated to create time dimensions (Year, Month, Quarter) from date fields
A calendar object on the sheet

q: In the Data Manager, Qlik Sense automatically detects date fields and creates derived fields.
Which script keyword is used to combine two tables by appending rows from one to the other?
The JOIN keyword merges columns from two tables based on common fields.
A _____ Join keeps all records from the left table and matching records from the right table.
Rearrange Join Syntax:
What is the result of using 'Inner Join'?
o: Only records with matching keys in both tables are kept
All records from both tables are kept
Records from the first table are kept
Records from the second table are kept

q: The KEEP prefix functions similarly to JOIN but stores the tables separately in the data model.
Match Join Type:
Which function allows you to format a number as currency?
The Year() function extracts the year from a date field.
The _____ function returns the current system date and time.
Rearrange Date Format:
What is 'Section Access' used for?
o: To control data security and user access to specific rows/fields
To access different sections of the script

q: In Section Access, the field 'ACCESS' defines the level of privilege (e.g., ADMIN, USER).
The _____ field in Section Access is often used to link to the data model for row-level security.
Match Security Field:
What does the set analysis function P() stand for?
The set function E() returns the set of Excluded values.
Set operator _____ returns the union of two sets.
Rearrange Element Set:
Which Qlik Sense feature allows you to bundle visualizations and extensions for reuse?
You can import third-party extensions into Qlik Sense via the QMC.
The _____ Management Console (QMC) is used for administrative tasks like publishing apps.
Match QMC Section:
What is a 'Stream' in Qlik Sense?
o: A collection of apps that a specific group of users can access

q: Once an app is published to a stream, its sheets cannot be modified by standard users (only community sheets can be added).
The _____ Task in QMC is used to schedule data reloads.
Rearrange Publish:
Which debugging tool helps you understand how long each part of the reload script takes?
o: Operations Monitor (or Log files with timestamps)

q: Debug mode allows you to limit the number of records loaded to test scripts quickly.
The _____ statement in the script creates a break point for debugging.
Match Debug Feature:
How can you apply a custom color theme to your entire app?
Responsive design means Qlik Sense apps automatically adjust layout for different screen sizes.
Qlik Sense uses a _____ layout, allowing you to resize and arrange objects freely primarily snap-to-grid.
Rearrange Theme:
What is the function of the 'MAPPING' prefix in a load statement?
o: Creates a temporary table used for mapping values (like VLOOKUP)

q: Mapping tables are dropped automatically after the script finishes.
Which script prefix is used to transform a cross-table (pivot) structure into a flat table with two columns?
The REIDENT load allows you to load data from an existing table that has already been loaded into memory.
The _____ function checks if a specific field value has already been loaded into the data model.
Rearrange Crosstable:
What is the difference between Peek() and Previous()?
o: Peek() can look into any table (including current) at any row; Previous() only looks at the previous record in the input source.

q: The Exists(Field, Value) function can only be used in the WHERE clause.
Match Script Function:
Which function allows you to interpret a string as a date format (e.g., '2023.12.31')?
The Date() function formats a number as a date string.
The _____ prefix allows you to transpose rows and columns in a loaded table.
Rearrange Interpretation:
What does the set expression '1-$' represent?
o: The inverse of the current selection (records NOT selected)

q: The set operator '*=' returns the intersection of two sets (values present in both).
The set operator _____ excludes records in the second set from the first set.
Match Set Operator:
What allows you to perform comparative analysis by creating separate selection states?
You can assign a specific sheet object to an Alternate State.
To reference an alternate state 'GroupA' in set analysis, you use: Sum({_____} Sales).
Rearrange Alt State:
What Qlik Sense feature allows large datasets to be queried and aggregated on-demand?
ODAG works by generating a new selection app based on a detailed subset of data.
_____ Views allow you to embed charts from another app into your current app, updating on refresh.
Match Advanced Feature:
Which loop structure is used in Qlik Sense script to iterate through a list of values?
You can use parameters in variables to create reusable calculations like func(x,y).
The _____ loop executes a block of code while a condition is true.
Rearrange Loop:
What is the purpose of the 'Qualify' statement?
o: To prefix field names with the table name to prevent automatic association

q: The Unqualify statement stops the Qualify logic for subsequent loaded fields.
The _____ statement creates a stored file (QVD, CSV) from a resident table.
Match Script Cmd:
How can you view the performance statistics of your objects on a sheet?
o: Use the '.developer' developer tools in the browser

q: Objects in Qlik Sense are rendered using HTML5 and CSS3.
Which script function is used to replace a field value with a value from a mapping table?
The ApplyMap function is faster than a Join for simple value lookups.
The _____ prefix is used to load a table that defines intervals (ranges) to match with discrete values.
Rearrange Mapping:
What is the 'Hierarchy' load prefix used for?
o: To transform an adjacency list table (ID, ParentID) into an expanded table with separate fields for each level
To create a hierarchical drill-down group

q: The HierarchyBelongsTo prefix is used to load the entire ancestry for each node.
Match Function:
Which Qlik Engine API method returns the layout of an app, including its sheets and objects?
The 'Capability APIs' allow you to embed Qlik Sense visualizations into web pages.
The _____ API is used to perform selections in an embedded Qlik object.
Rearrange API Call:
What determines which data a user can see in an app with Section Access?
o: The match between the user's REDUCTION field value and the data field value

q: If a user is not listed in the Section Access table, they can see all data by default.
The _____ field in Section Access is used to hide specific fields from the user.
Match Security Rule:
In the QMC, what is a 'Security Rule' used for?
o: To define what resources (apps, streams, etc.) a user can access and what actions they can perform

q: Security rules in Qlik Sense are attribute-based, allowing for dynamic access control.
To grant access to a stream, you create a rule on the _____ resource filter.
Rearrange Rule Logic:
What is a 'Mashup' in the context of Qlik Sense?
o: A web page that integrates Qlik Sense visualizations with other web content
A mix of two different datasets

q: Mashups require a separate server from the Qlik Sense Enterprise server.
You can create mashups using the _____ Workbench.
Match Integration:
Which function converts a timestamp into a date date?
The Floor() function rounds a number down to the nearest integer.
The _____ function returns the integer part of a number.
Rearrange Rounding:
What is the purpose of the 'Autonumber' function?
o: To replace complex composite keys with a compact integer to save memory

q: AutonumberHash128() generates a 128-bit hash of the input string.
Using Autonumber on a key field can significantly reduce the application's _____ footprint.
Match Hash Func:
How can you debug a Section Access configuration?
o: Open the app without data (open from Hub context menu only if available) or use a test user

q: If you lock yourself out with Section Access, you can open the app without data if you are the owner (in some versions/settings).
Which script keyword forces the concatenation of two tables even if they don't have identical field names?
The Left Keep prefix keeps the data in the source table but filters it based on the keys in the already loaded table.
The _____ function returns the first non-null parameter.
Rearrange Alt Func:
What is the result of P({<Year={2023}>} Customer) in Set Analysis?
o: The set of Customers who have transactions in 2023
The set of Years for a Customer

q: You can use the 'CreateSessionApp' API to create a temporary app in memory without persisting it to disk.
Match API Method:
Which QMC component allows you to define authentication methods (e.g., SAML, Header)?
A Virtual Proxy is an interface for users to access the Qlik Sense Hub or QMC.
The _____ property in extension definitions describes the structure of the properties panel.
Rearrange Extension Prop:
Which security rule context field references the user's properties?
Security rules can be applied to custom properties assigned to apps and streams.
The _____ function allows you to aggregate a field based on the distinct values of another field.
Match Load Prefix:
What is the purpose of 'Force Concatenate'?
o: To force two tables with different structures to be concatenated into one

q: When using Force Concatenate, missing fields are populated with NULL values.
The _____ function converts a number to a string specifying the format.
Rearrange Num Format:
What API is used to manage bookmarks programmatically?
You can use 'ApplyBookmark' to apply a bookmark's selections.
The _____ function evaluates an expression at a specific dimensionality level.
Match Aggr Part:
Which function allows you to get the name of the current user?
The ClientPlatform() function returns the browser or client type.
The _____ function returns the name of the Qlik Sense application.
Rearrange System Func:
Which charts support the 'Continuous Axis' feature?
o: Line chart (and Bar chart in newer versions)

q: A continuous axis allows you to zoom in and see a continuous range of data (e.g., time).
The _____ chart is used to display the distribution of values and identify outliers.
Match Visual:
What is the 'Visual Search' feature in Qlik Sense?
o: The ability to search within listboxes and charts by clicking the search icon

q: You can use wildcards (*, ?) in visual search queries.
Which script function allows you to temporarily cache data in a local QVD file to speed up subsequent loads?
A 'Link Table' is used to resolve synthetic keys and circular references by storing common keys.
The _____ statement in the script generates statistics on the data (like distinct values, min/max) into a table.
Rearrange Buffer Load:
What is the primary use of the Aggr() function?
o: To perform nested aggregations (calculations over an array of results)

q: RangeSum() treats NULL values as 0, whereas Sum() + Sum() might result in NULL.
Match Range Func:
Which Qlik feature allows you to define custom metadata tags for users, apps, and streams in the QMC?
Custom properties can be used in Security Rules to simplify access control logic.
The _____ load mode in Buffer Load forces a refresh of the buffer file despite its age.
Rearrange Aggr Syntax:
What is the difference between implicit and explicit set operators?
o: Implicit uses the default state; Explicit defines the sets clearly (e.g., + vs += )

q: Using 'Concatenated Keys' (creating a single composite key field) is generally preferred over using Link Tables for simple loops.
The _____ function is used to return the ranking of a value in a range.
Match Data Model:
Which Chart Function allows you to reference columns by name?
Column(1) references the first column in a straight table.
The _____ function returns the number of rows in the current chart visualization.
Rearrange Table Func:
What allows you to balance the load of apps across multiple Qlik Sense nodes?
You can pin an app to a specific node using load balancing rules.
The _____ node is responsible for reloading apps in a multi-node environment (typically).
Match Node Role:
Which function allows you to calculate the moving average?
The Above() function retrieves the value of an expression from the row above the current one.
The _____ function is used to create 'Total' rows in a straight table (custom calculation).
Rearrange Moving Avg:
What is 'Generic Object' in the context of Qlik APIs?
o: A flexible object that can store properties and data dynamically

q: Generic Objects are the foundation for almost all visualizations in Qlik Sense.
The _____ Properties allow you to define what data the generic object should contain (e.g., a hypercube).
Match API Concept:
Which set modifier forces a field selection to be ignored completely?
Sum({<Year=>} Sales) calculates sales ignoring the Year selection.
What component in QMC is responsible for syncing user attributes from an external source (like AD or LDAP)?
You can configure Qlik Sense to use SAML for authentication.
The _____ API allows you to retrieve the data underlying a visualization (the hypercube).
Rearrange UDC Sync:
What is a 'Calculation Condition' used for in a chart?
o: To prevent the chart from calculating/rendering until a specific condition is met (e.g., selection count)

q: Calculation conditions help improve performance by avoiding expensive calculations on large datasets.
Match API Object:
Which Capability API method is used to close the current session?
The 'Root' object in the Capability API allows you to access global methods like 'openApp'.
The _____ container allows you to nest visualizations in a grid layout within a single object.
Rearrange API Method:
How does Qlik Sense handle variable evaluation in large apps?
o: Variables are evaluated globally; excessive use in chart expressions can impact performance
Variables are pre-calculated and cached forever

q: Using variables to store complex set analysis strings is a common best practice.
The _____ log in QMC records administrative actions like rule changes and app publishing.
Match Log Type:
What is the result of GetHyperCubeData()?
o: A set of data pages containing the calculated values of dimensions and measures

q: You can define the size of the data page (width and height) when requesting HyperCube data.
The _____ method allows you to select values in a HyperCube based on cell indices.
Rearrange HyperCube:
What is 'SAML Attribute Mapping' in QMC?
o: Mapping attributes from the Identity Provider (e.g., email, group) to Qlik Sense user properties

q: SAML authentication requires a virtual proxy configuration.
The _____ attribute is typically mapped to the User ID in Qlik Sense.
Match Auth Method:
Which feature helps regular users create charts without knowing data model details?
Insight Advisor can generate charts based on natural language queries.
The _____ Logic capability allows you to define business rules (like default aggregations) for Insight Advisor.
Rearrange Insight:
What is the 'paint' method in a visualization extension?
o: The function that renders the visualization each time the data or size changes
The function that sets the background color
The function that saves the app

q: Extensions created with the Capability API often inject HTML into a container element provided by Qlik.
The _____ function is called once when the extension is initialized.
Match Extension Part:
How can you monitor the reload history of all apps?
o: QMC > Reload Tasks or Operations Monitor App

q: The 'Operations Monitor' is a pre-built Qlik Sense app that tracks system performance and usage.
What does the system variable 'ErrorMode = 0' do in the load script?
o: Ignores errors and continues script execution

q: ErrorMode = 1 is the default behavior, which halts execution upon script error.
The _____ load prefix allows you to load data that describes relations between fields (e.g., tags).
Rearrange Error Handle:
Which property in the extension 'support' definition enables the snapshot feature (for storytelling)?
You must implement the 'snapshot' property in your QEXT file to allow users to take snapshots of your extension.
The _____ property in the 'support' object allows users to export data from your extension.
Match Support Prop:
What is the primary function of a 'Sync Rule' in a multi-node Qlik Sense environment?
o: To determine which apps should be synchronized (copied) from the central node to a rim node

q: Sync rules are evaluated on the central node to push content to rim nodes.
You typically use a custom property like _____ to tag apps for specific nodes.
Rearrange Sync Logic:
Which optimization technique helps when using complex variables in chart expressions?
o: Using $(=...) to pre-calculate the variable value once (if it's static per selection) instead of calculating per row
Defining the variable in the script only

q: Variables with parameters (e.g., vCalc($1)) are always calculated per row in a chart.
The _____ statement creates a variable in the script that is not expanded during script execution but is available in the front-end.
Match Var Eval:
How does Qlik Sense Mobile handle offline access?
o: It downloads the app and its data (or a subset) to the device for offline interaction
It caches the last screen image
It does not support offline access

q: Qlik Sense Mobile uses the Qlik Associative Engine running locally on the iOS device.
You can restrict offline access to an app using a _____ rule.
Rearrange Mobile:
What is the purpose of the 'Client' API?
o: To detect the device type (touch, desktop) and adjust UI logic

q: The 'client.isPersonal' property returns true if the user is using Qlik Sense Desktop.
The _____ object in the Capability API helps check if the device supports touch.
Match Device:
Which script function returns the current row number in the resulting internal table?
RecNo() returns the record number from the input source table.
The _____ function returns the number of the current iteration in a While loop.
Rearrange Row Count:
What allows you to define a 'Business Logic' layer on top of your data model?
o: Insight Advisor Business Logic / Logical Model

q: Business Logic allows you to categorize fields as Dimensions, Measures, or Dates to help the Cognitive Engine.
You can define _____ to ensure certain fields are always used together in Insight Advisor.
Match Business Logic:
How can you trigger a task from an external system?
o: Using the QRS API (Repository Service API)

q: The QRS API communicates over HTTP/HTTPS using JSON.
What is 'Server-Side Extension' (SSE) in Qlik Sense?
o: A protocol that allows Qlik Sense to communicate with external calculation engines (e.g., Python, R)

q: SSE communicates with Qlik Sense via gRPC.
The _____ load mode allows you to query large database tables directly without loading data into memory (Direct Query).
answers: Direct Discovery (or Direct Query in SaaS)

q: Rearrange SSE Call:
What are 'Symbol Tables' in the Qlik Associative Engine?
o: Tables that store the distinct values of every field in the data model

q: Bit-stuffed pointers are used to link data tables to symbol tables efficiently.
The _____ determines the number of bits needed to represent a field's distinct values (e.g., 2 distinct values need 1 bit).
Match Engine Internals:
What is 'enigma.js'?
o: A JavaScript library for communicating with the Qlik Associative Engine

q: nebula.js is a library for building modern Qlik Sense visualizations and mashups.
In JWT authentication, the _____ claim asserts the user's identity (User ID).
Rearrange JWT:
What is QSEoK?
Qlik Cloud Services is built on a microservices architecture similar to QSEoK.
The _____ service in QSEoK handles the distribution of requests to engine pods.
Match Architecture:
Which advanced chart property allows for custom CSS styling in some extensions?
picasso.js uses a component-based architecture to compose charts from building blocks (like axes, points, lines).
The _____ property in picasso.js defines the mapping between data fields and visual properties.
Rearrange Picasso:
How does Qlik Sense manage memory for large datasets?
o: It uses an in-memory, compressed columnar store with demand-based loading

q: The Qlik Engine can reuse calculation results (cache) across different users if the state and data are the same.
The _____ limit determines the maximum RAM Qlik Sense will use before evicting cached results.
Match Memory:
What is the 'Broker' service in QSEoK?
o: It manages the lifecycle of engine pods and routes traffic

q: In Qlik Cloud, you can use 'Automations' to create workflows that trigger actions based on easy-to-configure blocks.
The _____ block in Application Automation starts the workflow.
Rearrange Automation:
Which security standard is used for exchanging authentication and authorization data between an identity provider and a service provider?
OIDC (OpenID Connect) is an authentication layer on top of OAuth 2.0.
In OIDC, the _____ token contains claims about the user.
Match Protocol:
What is 'Direct Discovery' (Legacy) limitation?
o: Visualizations with Direct Discovery fields may have performance limitations and not support all chart types

q: Direct Discovery fields are not loaded into memory but are queried from the source on selection.
What is the purpose of the 'Context' filter in Qlik Sense Security Rules?
o: To specify where the rule applies (e.g., QMC, Hub, or Both)

q: Security rules with 'Context' set to 'Hub' will affect user access in the QMC.
The _____ filter in a security rule allows you to define which specific resources (e.g., App_*) the rule applies to.
Rearrange Rule Config:
What is a 'Content Library' in Qlik Sense?
o: A storage location for static content like images and logo files used in apps and themes

q: By default, the 'Default' content library is accessible to all users.
You can use the _____ API to upload files to a content library programmatically.
Match Resource:
What does the 'SelectionState' API allow developers to do?
o: To monitor and interact with the current selections (selected values, locked fields, etc.) in the app

q: The SelectionState API can trigger an event when selections change.
The _____ method of the SelectionState object returns the current selections.
Rearrange Selection API:
What is the structure of a Qlik Sense custom theme?
o: A JSON file (theme.json), a CSS file, and optional image assets
A ZIP file with no structure

q: In a theme JSON, you can define default color palettes for charts.
The _____ property in theme.json defines the base font family for the app.
Match Theme Part:
How can you analyze the calculation time of an individual object?
o: Using the 'Calc Time' in the debug tool or Qlik Sense Developer Tools (Chrome extension)

q: High calculation times are often caused by complex expressions or large data volumes scanned.
The _____ usage of an object refers to the amount of RAM consumed to store calculations.
Rearrange Optimization:
What is a limitation of Qlik Sense Mobile offline mode?
o: It cannot dynamically query external data sources (Direct Discovery/Direct Query is not supported offline)

q: Extensions that require online resources (like external APIs) will not work in offline mode.
Offline apps are 'rehydrated' on the device using a local instance of the _____.
Match Mobile Limit:
What allows you to interact with the Qlik Cloud backend services (e.g. for user management)?
Qlik Cloud uses API keys (or OAuth) for programmatic access.
The _____ endpoint allows you to list and manage users in a Qlik Cloud tenant.
Rearrange Cloud API:
What is 'Section Access' STRICT EXCLUSION?
o: It means that if a user is not listed in Section Access, they are denied access to the app completely
It means they can see everything

q: If you omit the 'ACCESS' field in Section Access, the script will fail.
The _____ field in Section Access creates a reduction based on the data values.
Match Section Access:
Which Capability API method allows you to create a session object (generic object) on the fly?
Session objects persist in the app after the session ends.
You typically use _____ to define the structure (dimensions/measures) of a session hypercube.
Rearrange Create Cube:
What is the 'On-Demand App Generation' (ODAG) workflow?
o: Selecting data in a summary app to generate a detail app with only the selected subset of data

q: ODAG is useful for handling very large datasets (Big Data) by allowing users to drill down to details.
What is the 'Qlik Associative Big Data Index' (QABDI)?
o: A high-performance indexing engine that allows Qlik Sense to query massive datasets (data lakes) without loading them entirely into memory

q: QABDI creates a symbolic index of the data source, allowing for associative search on big data.
The _____ function in Set Analysis selects the possible values of a field based on another set expression.
Rearrange Set Analysis:
What does the E() function in Set Analysis do?
o: Returns a set of excluded values
Returns a set of empty values
Returns a set of error values

q: Aggr() functions can be nested.
